column1: Prachin Buri railway station is a railway station in Na Mueang Subdistrict
column3: Prachinburi. The station is a class 1 railway station  121.781 km (75.7 mi) from Bangkok railway station. The station opened in January 1925
column4: as part of the Eastern Line Chachoengsao Junction-Kabin Buri section.
